DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center study evaluate viral response patient chronic hepatitis C , genotype 1 , 2 , 3 & 4 standard anti-viral treatment Pegasys ( peginterferon alfa-2a ) Copegus ( ribavirin ) . Patients receive weekly subcutaneous Pegasys plus daily oral Copegus 24 week ( genotype 2 & 3 ) 48 week ( genotype 1 & 4 ) . Patients identify slow responders/non-rapid virological responder eligible additional 24 week treatment .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluating Slow Response/Non-Rapid Response Patients With Chronic Hepatitis C , Genotype 1 , 2 , 3 & 4 Treated With Pegasys ( Peginterferon Alfa-2a ) Copegus ( Ribavirin )
